about_the_game:
5 Brand new Mini Maps!

+200 In Game Death Coins

+5 Awesome Power Ups



Introducing the Mini Maps DLC for our popular multiplayer game!

5 Mini Maps (Mini Beach, Mini Graveyard, Mini Temple, Mini Lab and Mini Western) | +200 Death Coins | 5 Free Power Ups

This exciting new addition features five brand new mini maps that are perfect for intense, fast-paced battles.

First up is Mini Beach, where players can fight it out on a sunny sandy beach complete with palm trees and crystal clear waters. Next, we have Mini Graveyard, a spooky and atmospheric map set in an old cemetery. For a change of pace, players can head to Mini Temple, a beautifully designed temple nestled in a lush jungle.

For a more futuristic setting, players can check out Mini Lab, a high-tech research facility filled with advanced machinery and gadgets. Finally, we have Mini Western, a Wild West-themed map complete with saloons, sheriffs, and outlaws.

With these five new mini maps, players can enjoy countless hours of action-packed gameplay in a variety of unique and exciting settings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win XP/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ Support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
